definition: to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

sentences.english: In genomic lingo, the sequences are said to "drift.
sentences.chinese: 用基因組術語，這個序列稱之爲“漂移”。

sentences.english: Massive segments or plates of the crust move over the mantle in the process of continental drift.
sentences.chinese: 大陸漂移雕塑了地殼的外觀，使現在大陸形成。

sentences.english: The receiver has occurred frequency shift.
External layers of the star are forced outwards, drifting through space for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 恆星的外層被迫向外擴張，在太空中漂移數千年。

sentences.english: Before measurement the transducer must be checked for its "zero position shift".
sentences.chinese: 變送器在測量前，應校覈它是否發生了“零位漂移”。

sentences.english: Honeycomb style module of drift chambers produced for tracking high energy particles was described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹用於確定高能粒子徑跡的蜂房狀漂移室組件。

sentences.english: Nations cannot act and stand alone when tectonic plates are shifting.
sentences.chinese: 地質板塊正在漂移，國家再也不可能獨自行動。

sentences.english: He is a vaporous and shifting mirage.
sentences.chinese: 他像是一團霧，漂移不定，變幻莫測。

sentences.english: We murmur alike reproachfully rolling sands and drift, knowing not why.
sentences.chinese: 我們貌似低語卻在申斥滾石漂移，不知道累。

sentences.english: A few writers have suggested that perhaps continental drift causes polar wandering.
sentences.chinese: 一些作家已經提議也許大陸漂移引起兩極漫遊。

sentences.english: The continental drift and the development of the flowering plants.
sentences.chinese: 文章題目大陸漂移與有花植物區系的發展。

sentences.english: The problem of large zero drift always exists in microwave power meters with thermistor.
sentences.chinese: 熱敏電阻式微波功率計，一直存在零點漂移大的問題。

sentences.english: One possible reason for the rapid drift was a lack of ice, she suggested.
sentences.chinese: 她表示，漂移迅速的一個可能原因是冰量稀少。

sentences.english: Set up was a momentum analysis model of the drift velocity in stagnant liquid of long bubbles in an annular tube.
sentences.chinese: 建立圓管內滯止液體中長氣泡漂移速度動量分析模型。

sentences.english: The proposed system can eliminate the error given rise to temperature-variation and time-shift.
sentences.chinese: 該系統能消除溫度漂移與時間漂移引起的誤差。

sentences.english: The proposed system can eliminate the error given rise to temperature-variation and time-shift.
sentences.chinese: 該系統能消除溫度漂移與時間漂移引起的誤差。

definition: to slide/to coast/to glide/(of an aircraft) to taxi
to turn/to go around a corner
to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
